Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Milestones.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Relates to expanding employee ownership assistance for lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender and non-binary individuals
Summary: Relates to expanding employee ownership assistance for lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender and non-binary individuals.
LawCode: Amd §§1836-a, 1836-c & 1836-d, Pub Auth L; amd §§104-a & 210, Ec Dev L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law and the economic development law, in relation to expanding employee ownership assistance for lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender and non-binary individuals
